Title: Directs the state energy planning board to conduct a study on time frames for preparing renewable energy facilities for clean energy storage and distribution
Summary: Directs the state energy planning board to conduct a study on time frames for replacing or upgrading battery energy storage systems at renewable energy facilities in preparation for clean energy storage and distribution across the state.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the state energy planning board to conduct a study on the time frames for replacing or upgrading battery energy storage systems at renewable energy facilities
